channel.title: NLP on Anam Raihan
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Anam Raihan

item.title: Wikipedia Search Engine
item.description: This project aimed at designing a scalable and efficient search engine using 70 GB of Wikipedia data. The search engine outputs the top certain relevant documents based on the search query.

item.title: Mining-and-Summarising-Customer-Review
item.description: The objective of this project is to mine the features of the product on which customers have expressed their opinions. Identified frequent features and opinion words and generated opinion summary.
